name: SatFly
description: S.A.T to Tail Slide or Deep Stall directly connected into an Infinite Tumbling. The Tail Slide/Deep Stall must not necessarily be long but shall be entered directly from the exit a S.A.T. The S.A.T must be stalled “like” a S.A.T to Helico but instead of the Helico connected into a tail slide directly

criterias.normal: Rhythm, flow, trajectory (no roll movement), tension in the lines and glider, duration, exit or connection
criterias.twisted: Twisted on the entry, untwist during the transition to Tail Slide/Deep Stall  and proceed into the Infinity Tumbling without twist
criterias.twisted exit: stay twisted during the exit of the Infinity Tumbling
criterias.full twisted: Twisted on the entry and stay twisted until the exit of the infinity tumbling
criterias.hardcore entry: Same as full twisted but with change of twist during the entrance of the S.A.T. Be creative :)
criterias.cab slide: get twisted during an infinity tumbling turn
criterias.devil twist: from a twisted situation, change of twist direction (within one turn)

connection: Forbidden connection to Tumbling or Anti-Rhythmic SAT
